content.raw:
Could you elaborate on your use case? Ignition Transport is able to publish any Protobuf messages, not only Ignition Messages. See the example [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/ign-transport7/example/) where a custom string message is created and published with `publisher_custom_msg`. Does that cover your use case?

> Are there any plans to export the message generation framework so it can be used by other projects?

I don't think there is. But if there's a valid use case we could consider.
